name: Carporton
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
diet centered on salted fish and seaweed
tide-blessing festivals tied to local navigation rites
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized labour
navigational auguries cannot replace charts and seamanship
notes: Population unknown; transient harbor traffic fluctuates seasonally
vulnerable to storms and raiders; maintains small outlying watchposts
